org.silex.core.XmlUtils

type
class
This class gathers XML utilities Taken from silex v1, except 2 methods: Xml2Dynamic & xml2DynamicRecursive

Static Methods

cleanUp(xml : Xml) : Xml

This method takes an XML, removes white spaces, indent & comments, and then return the XML. For now it just calling the equivalent recursive method. It is better to have two methods for recursive algorithms, one to initialise recursion, the other for recursion

stringIndent2Xml(xmlString : String) : Xml

This method takes an XML String (indented or not), and returns the cleaned XML.

xml2StringIndent(xml : Xml) : String

This method takes an XML object and returns the indented string equivalent.
